verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is here, hallelujah!
He is here, amen!
He is here, holy, holy!
I will bless His holy name.
He is here; listen closely.
Here Him calling out your name.
He is here; you can tough Him.
You will never be the same.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I sense an awesome moving of the Holy Spirit.
I see His countenance resting on your face.
I know that there are angels hovering all around us,
For the presence of the Lord is in this place.
